sub_title: Senior Account Manager | Navigating your journey of bridging the gap to thrive in new 'worlds' | Digital, Innovation, Communication & Social Platforms | ‘New Work’ & Well-being Advocate
summary:
My personal mission is to bring people and 'worlds' together so that we can co-create our future from a place of awareness, collaboration, intelligence, innovation and sustainability. 

I 𝗲𝘅𝗽𝗹𝗼𝗿𝗲 various worlds: Venturing between the physical space (our planet & human bodyset) to the digital space (and social platforms) to the non-material space. 
I 𝗲𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 within these spaces: Incorporating modern & original methodologies, approaches and technologies into daily practice.
I 𝗰𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗲 new bridges based on common and complimentary themes within and between worlds.
I 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁 these bridges to relevant situations, conversations and projects while supporting people's curiosity to explore worlds that are 'new' for them.

𝗦𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗦𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗶𝗰 𝗔𝗰𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗻𝘁 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝘁 𝗧𝗿𝗶𝗰𝘆𝗰𝗹𝗲 𝗘𝘂𝗿𝗼𝗽𝗲
In this role, I operate in the world of Social Platforms and Digital Transformation. For 5 years I was a Digital Selling & Senior Executive Branding Consultant, supporting sales & marketing teams and C-Suite (CXO) Leaders at Fortune 100 companies to adopt & leverage their digital toolkit as a way to achieve their greater business objectives. Now I bring an insight-driven approach from my experience to think alongside my clients in crafting success through designing objective, and KPI-led programs which deliver value, foster change and demonstrate impact.

𝗖𝗘𝗢 𝗮𝘁 "𝗔𝗹𝗹𝗶𝘀𝗼𝗻" // 𝗖𝗼𝗮𝗰𝗵, 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁, 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗼𝗿, 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗺𝘂𝗻𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿
Originating from Phoenix, Arizona, I have spent the last 14 years "finding home" in different cities, states, and countries. My immigration experience has become a catalyst for self-awareness and personal growth. Along my journey I've integrated various modalities & philosophies from coaches, mentors, indigenous elders, practitioners and leaders around the globe. I'm an International Certified Coach & NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming) Master Practitioner, and I bring my learnings to all my activities of helping people to "find home within yourself, no matter where you are in the world".

𝗟𝗲𝘁’𝘀 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻!
If you would like to work with me in the context of what I do at Tricycle Europe, connect with me here and email me at: a.meekins@tricycle-europe.com

If you would like to collaborate, partner or work with me in the context of what I do at "Allison", connect with me here and/or email me at: allison.n.meekins@gmail.com

treasury_media.title: Interview with Sales Enablement Lead Citrix Sharon Ehrlich | A Personal Digital Transformation Journey
Interview | Digital Evolution: Where are we now? | with Accenture Digital Marketing Strategist Lennart Sloof
treasury_media.description: Our Executive Digital Branding Coach, Allison Meekins, has been interviewed by Lennart Sloof (Manager Digital Marketing Strategies at Accenture Netherlands) on the topic of digital selling transformation. They spent time together exchanging perspectives about their experiences working together. Lennart is the visionary of some Accenture programs that Tricycle Europe is running. Allison is having the role of executing such digital marketing and sales transformation programs with leadership teams.

treasury_media.title: How Humble Leadership Really Works
treasury_media.description: Top-down leadership is outdated and counterproductive.

treasury_media.title: Bridging Personal and Professional Development
treasury_media.description: Since I was a little girl, I dreamed of being a singer; conveying a story, a message, and unifying humans through the power of music. Today, I occassionally take the stage at local 'open mic nights' to perform through the art of sound- sharing my own stories, and those of others which resonate with me. It's a learning process, and a rewarding journey with many lessons & challenges which contribute towards my overall development and professional growth.

treasury_media.title: Xerox Forum 2018 "The Power of Social Selling to Close Business" with Catherine Young

contributors.headline: Senior Account Manager | Navigating your journey of bridging the gap to thrive in new 'worlds' | Digital, Innovation, Communication & Social Platforms | ‘New Work’ & Well-being Advocate
Learning & Development Manager | Employee Experience @ Ace & Tate | People & Culture

profile_positions.description: My approach to Account Management is to deep dive into your world, elicit what is really going on, and design solutions which provide you with continuous value. My focus is your success, and I will leverage my resources, network, and knowledge-base to build exactly what you need to get what you want. I will coach and consult you along the way, and we won't stop until we've reached our goal. I'm all-in, are you? Let's get started!
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Manager

profile_positions.description: One of the ambitions I have for creating the role of Strategic Development Specialist is to bring vision into manifestation. The company has solely been focused on supporting clients, and from which, the company has developed into a team of 40+ employees from around the world. And when giving more attention to building a sustainable, internal system which fosters growth, we can be so much more. My role is to be a business partner to the Owners of the company; coaching them on what they want for the future of the company and guiding them with how to get there from a people-first, and pragmatic perspective. Furthermore, I bring the Strategic Plan to the team, and lead all initiatives which support the company direction, mission and vision.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Development Specialist
Co-Founder & Owner | Coach, Mentor, Connector, Community Builder

profile_positions.description:
Our digital presence has come to be (in some cases) as important as our in-person presence. How often are we taking the time to reflect what we do in real life, and communicate that digitally, or vice versa? It was my purpose in this role as Executive Digital Branding Consultant to support people in discovering their unique personal brand, aligning both real-life and digital (social platform) identities, and creating a strategy where these two can support the client's holistic performance improvement, and goal achievement. 

I coached and consulted C-Suite, Executive Leaders, Board of Directors who are in the Technology and Innovation Global B2B Enterprise and Consulting space (Signify, Accenture, Citrix, Microsoft).
profile_positions.title: Senior (Executive) Digital Business Consultant | Social Media & Digital Communication

profile_positions.description: Built the Learning and Development department from ground zero, including the establishment of department activities and responsibilities, KPI's and measurement systems, and set up the operational foundation. Later, resigned from department management, but continued to support with providing programming feedback and "coaching-focused" activities into the Learning and Development initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Learning and Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
At Tricycle Europe, we focus our energy and attention towards sustainable relationship building, as this is the core of every business. As time seems to become more sparse in this digital era, how do we ensure that we maintain the relationships we've built, meanwhile developing new connections as we continue to grow as professionals with evolved business objectives?

Success stories we have from our customers and Partners, current research, and my personal experience exemplifies that Social Selling is an effective approach to compliment the management of your business relationships. As a Social Selling Coach, it is my job to accommodate you through your Social Selling journey to support the achievement of your business objectives.

Partnering with Sales Managers and teams, Marketing teams and Leaders at Signify and Microsoft.
profile_positions.title: Digital Business Consultant | Social Media & Digital Communication

profile_positions.description: Gather is a podium for new brands, young artists and designers where they can create and experiment. I found Gather in a moment that I was ready to experiment with the concept of GROW - A Coaching and Personal Development Café. Created the holistic vision and activation of project. I was the executing Coach and Manager at GROW, providing people with the chance to 'get grounded' with earthly elements, a plant potting station, space to reflect in the café swinging chair, and to purchase a Coaching session with their cappuccino.
profile_positions.title: Founder and Project Manager of GROW

profile_positions.description: Developed client portfolio (entertainment groups Cirque du Soleil and Iron Man cast/crew)  independently and as part of a team. Provided end-to-end contracting service for Housing, busing, freight, and Charter Flight bookings in each city of the client’s itinerary. Partnered with suppliers to negotiate contract terms and ensure mutual agreements between client and provider. Communicated with clients on a daily basis to provide exceptional client relationships - answering questions, providing updates, and resolving requested changes for their booking.
profile_positions.title: Contracting and Individual Reservations Coordinator | Key Operations Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Specialized in VIP artist relations & hospitality - managing all specifications and requirements of clients. Managing performance of all internal, related parties to ensure utmost client satisfaction. Cooperated with Director of Operations during day of show (DOS), ensuring all immediate changes and last-minute adaptions of events were solved with an innovative, seamless and prompt solution. Initiated company expansion to the corporate/private event ('white label') offering.
profile_positions.title: Event Production Associate and VIP Artist Relations | Event Management

profile_positions.description: Personal Assistant to CEO, Director of Recruitment, and CTO. Managed offices in San Francisco (CA), Raleigh (NC), Chicago (IL). The office "optimizer": innovating and implementing new organizational systems, communication processes and tooling, answering internal/external questions, immediate problem-solving, scheduling & booking VIP meetings, hospitality, event management.
profile_positions.title: Executive Assistant (CEO, CTO) and Office Manager

company.name: Changing All Lives through Music (C.A.L.M.) Productions

profile_positions.company: Changing All Lives through Music (C.A.L.M.) Productions
profile_positions.description: "Combining the heart of music with the hands of service". It was my vision to enable the local music scene for good in Chico, CA while I was studying Music Industry and Technology. I established the organization from the ground up - developing the by-standards, creating the mission, vision, short and long-term goals, strategies to achieve them, and accepted 20+ Music Industry and Business students to become members of the organization. Developed key relationships with local radio, Universities, venues, sponsors, and other partners to ensure maximum visibility and growth potential. We produced benefit concerts with local musicians, donating all proceeds to a variety of local non-profits around the Chico area.
profile_positions.title: Founder & President
